short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplifies the Zapier interface and adds useful features

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplifies the Zapier interface and adds useful features

Highlights:
- Folder searching
- Commit messages
- On Zap row hover show the Zap steps in a tooltip
- Improved sidebar styling
- Improved Zap list styling
- Prevention of publishing a Zap without a name
- And much more coming soonâ€¦

See the website for more info.
